about_the_game:
Spellslime is a fast-paced rougelite adventure with chill and relaxing vibes. Leap, blast and spellcast your way through the Slimelord's horde. Gain powerful synergistic upgrades, summon the elements to defend you, and explore a world full of colorful, exotic locations.

Spellslime puts you in control of a weak but determined young slime starting a one-slime rebellion against the tyrannical Slimelord. Left with a magical inheritance shrouded in mystery and danger, you must fight to survive and find out the truth of your world.

Slimes of all shapes and sizes oppose you. Boost your strengths, find their weaknesses, and crush them into slimey submission before they do the same to you. Experience the thrill of permadeath, with risk and reward constantly dancing on a razor's edge. Defeat the Slimelord in one life or try again. When you die (and you will die), you'll unlock new spells, abilities, and upgrades to spice up your next life.

Challenging and varied combat, hundreds of upgrade paths to explore, three stunning worlds full of surprises, and the joy of smackin' some slime make for a heart-pumping and satisfying action game.
